name: PlatformerShooterTestGround
description:
A Platformer Shooter Prototype game made in 48 hours during Mix and Game Jam 2020

I made most mechanic except camera following and IK system.

player and AI use the same weapon system and Inventory system, the diferent between Player and AI is player using PlayInput script to control it , and AI's is control by AI behaviour script.

sadly I didn't finished

Still, it's fun to do such thing :)

Moving : W,A,S,D
Shooting : Left Mouse
Switch Weapon : 1,2
